mapper.update:
update iel_out
out_no = #{outNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = now(),
repair_id = #{repairId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
repair_no = #{repairNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update iel_out set out_no = #{outNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = now(), repair_id = #{repairId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, repair_no = #{repairNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from iel_out
and operator_id = #{adminId}
order by create_time desc
